briefdescription.para: Flags that affect how processing algorithms are run.
Temporary project owned by the context, used for storing temporarily loaded map layers.
Constructor for QgsProcessingContext.
QgsProcessingContext cannot be copied.
Adds a layer to load (by ID or datasource) into the canvas upon completion of the algorithm or model.

detaileddescription.para:
The details parameter dictates the LayerDetails.
setLayersToLoadOnCompletion()
layersToLoadOnCompletion()
willLoadLayerOnCompletion()
layerToLoadOnCompletionDetails()

briefdescription.para: Copies all settings which are safe for use across different threads from other to this context.
Returns the default encoding to use for newly created files.
Returns the expression context.
Returns the expression context.
Returns the associated feedback object.
Returns any flags set in the context.
Returns a map layer from the context with a matching identifier.

detaileddescription.para: This method considers layer IDs, names and sources when matching the identifier (see QgsProcessingUtils::mapLayerFromString() for details).
Ownership is not transferred and remains with the context.

briefdescription.para: Returns the callback function to use when encountering an invalid geometry and invalidGeometryCheck() is set to GeometryAbortOnInvalid.
Returns the behavior used for checking invalid geometries in input layers.
Returns a map of layers (by ID or datasource) to LayerDetails, to load into the canvas upon completion of the algorithm or model.
Returns a reference to the details for a given layer which is loaded on completion of the algorithm or model.

simplesect.para: First check willLoadLayerOnCompletion(), or calling this method will incorrectly add layer as a layer to load on completion.

briefdescription.para: QgsProcessingContext cannot be copied.
Returns the project in which the algorithm is being executed.
Pushes the thread affinity for the context (including all layers contained in the temporaryLayerStore()) into another thread.

detaileddescription.para:
This method is only safe to call when the current thread matches the existing thread affinity for the context (see thread()).
thread()

briefdescription.para: Sets the default encoding to use for newly created files.
Sets the expression context.
Sets an associated feedback object.

detaileddescription.para:
This allows context related functions to report feedback and errors to users and processing logs. While ideally this feedback object should outlive the context, only a weak pointer to feedback is stored and no errors will occur if feedback is deleted before the context. Ownership of feedback is not transferred.
setFeedback()

briefdescription.para: Sets flags for the context.
Sets a callback function to use when encountering an invalid geometry and invalidGeometryCheck() is set to GeometryAbortOnInvalid.

detaileddescription.para:
This function will be called using the feature with invalid geometry as a parameter.
invalidGeometryCallback()
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Sets the behavior used for checking invalid geometries in input layers.

detaileddescription.para:
Settings this to anything but QgsFeatureRequest::GeometryNoCheck will also reset the invalidGeometryCallback() to a default implementation.
invalidGeometryCheck()

briefdescription.para: Sets the map of layers (by ID or datasource) to LayerDetails, to load into the canvas upon completion of the algorithm or model.
Sets the project in which the algorithm will be executed.

detaileddescription.para: This also automatically sets the transformContext() to match the project's transform context.

briefdescription.para: Sets the coordinate transform context.

detaileddescription.para: Note that setting a project for the context will automatically set the coordinate transform context.

briefdescription.para: Sets a callback function to use when encountering a transform error when iterating features.

detaileddescription.para:
This function will be called using the feature which encountered the transform error as a parameter.
transformErrorCallback()
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Takes the result map layer with matching id from the context and transfers ownership of it back to the caller.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used to remove temporary layers which are not required for further processing from a context.

briefdescription.para: Takes the results from another context and merges them with the results currently stored in this context.

detaileddescription.para: This includes settings like any layers loaded in the temporaryLayerStore() and layersToLoadOnCompletion(). This is only safe to call when both this context and the other context share the same thread() affinity, and that thread is the current thread.

briefdescription.para: Returns a reference to the layer store used for storing temporary layers during algorithm execution.
Returns the thread in which the context lives.
Returns the coordinate transform context.
Returns the callback function to use when encountering a transform error when iterating features.
Returns true if the given layer (by ID or datasource) will be loaded into the current project upon completion of the algorithm or model.
Contains information about the context in which a processing algorithm is executed.

detaileddescription.para:
Contextual information includes settings such as the associated project, and expression context.
QGIS 3.0
